mapper.insert: insert into RCP (RCP_PK, RCP_TITLE, RCP_CONTENT, RCP_CT, RCP_VEGE, RCP_COUNT, RCP_REG, RCP_HIT, RCP_LIKE, RCP_COM, USR_ID, RCP_IMG) VALUES(#{RCP_PK},#{RCP_TITLE}, #{RCP_CONTENT}, #{RCP_CT}, #{RCP_VEGE}, #{RCP_COUNT}, sysdate, 0, 0, 0, #{USR_ID}, #{RCP_IMG})
insert into RCP_RESO (RCPRS_PK, RCPRS_TITLE, RCPRS_AMOUNT, RCP_PK) VALUES(RCPRS_PK.NEXTVAL, #{RCPRS_TITLE}, #{RCPRS_AMOUNT}, #{RCP_PK})
insert into RCP_CONT (RCPCT_PK,RCPCT_NUM, RCPCT_CONTENT, RCP_PK) VALUES(RCPCT_PK.NEXTVAL,#{RCPCT_NUM}, #{RCPCT_CONTENT}, #{RCP_PK})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RCP ORDER BY RCP_PK DESC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cntPerPage} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE RCP SET RCP_TITLE = #{RCP_TITLE}, RCP_CONTENT = #{RCP_CONTENT}, RCP_VEGE = #{RCP_VEGE}, RCP_CT = #{RCP_CT}, RCP_COUNT = #{RCP_COUNT} WHERE RCP_PK = ${RCP_PK}
mapper.delete: delete from RCP_SCRAP where RCP_PK=#{RCP_PK} and USR_ID=#{USR_ID}
